testcase.name: Checkout Scenario Sauce Labs Backpack
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "swag_labs" login page.....................................passed And User logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"..passed And User adds "sauce-labs-backpack" to cart.................................passed And User clicks on shopping cart............................................passed And User clicks on checkout button..........................................passed And User gives firstname "ali"..............................................passed And User gives lastname "kerem".............................................passed And user gives postcode "170123"............................................passed And User clicks on continute button.........................................passed And User clicks on finish button............................................passed Then User verifies successful message "checkout_expected_success_msg".......passed
